snippet: Americans need an accounting of the C.I.A.’s astounding cash payments to President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan.
abstract: Editorial expresses alarm over revelation of cash payments made by Central Intelligence Agency to Afghan Pres Hamid Karzai, which have enabled Karzai to build vast patronage network and secure his power base; contends that payments helped fuel corruption while buying minimal and erratic cooperation from Karzai's government; urges Congress to publicly call CIA to account.
lead_paragraph: Americans need an accounting of the C.I.A.’s astounding cash payments to President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan.

headline.seo: ‘Ghost Money,’ and Lots of It in Afghanistan
